'The Giant' is a live album by trumpeter Dizzy Gillespie recorded in Paris,
France in 1973 and first released on the French America label. [http://www.jazzdisco.org/dizzy-gillespie/catalog/#america-30-am-
6133 Dizzy Gillespie discography] accessed April 13, 2012
